item.title: Setting up docker buildx on Linux
item.description: Docker buildx on Linux # Installation instructions for Ubuntu To execute docker commands without sudo. We need to add username to the docker group Find current username by typing who Add username to docker group Reboot system $ who vikaspogu :0 2020-12-05 10:10 (:0) $ sudo usermod -aG docker vikaspogu $ sudo reboot Enable buildx # Create a new config.json file under ~.docker folder and enable experimental feature $ mkdir ~/.
